home.title: Children's Illustrator / Fantasy / Comic

card.headline: Lunatique is a collection of humorous comics and gags, mostly set in space.
card.content:
In a minimalist and na√Øve graphic style, the characters evolve in an absurd and poetic universe.

The crowdfunding for Lunatique, the space fanzine, is now available.

card.headline: A book-CD for little ones aged 0 to 6
card.content:
The texts are by Arantxa Hirigoyen, the music by Philippe Albor, and I did the illustrations :)

Produced by the Belarri record label, by Matthieu Haramboure.
Ttinka is available online since November 15th on the Belarri website.

about.bubble1:
My name is Amaia and I am an illustrator.
I create children's illustrations, fantasy art, and humorous comics.
about.bubble2: I am a Basque speaker, and I also enjoy illustrating things related to Basque mythology and culture.
